sn35.7:1.3: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṃ cakkhusmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.5: paccuppannassa cakkhussa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.7:1.10: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītāya jivhāya anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.12: paccuppannāya jivhāya nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
sn35.7:1.16: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako atītasmiṃ manasmiṃ anapekkho hoti;
sn35.7:1.18: paccuppannassa manassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hotī”ti.
